alert.note: Alert for Harris; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:03AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Talbot and Harris Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 903 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Hamilton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Shiloh, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Cataula, Baughville, Flint Hill, Olive Branch, Mountain Hill, Jones Crossroads, Fortson, Pine Mountain Valley, Mulberry Grove, and Whitesville-Pine Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
